pic1_alt: The Hot Ones logo. The words hot and ones drawn in the style of a neon sign. A chicken's head emerges from the o in hot, with an x in its eye. The chicken is breathing fire.
pic2_alt: A screen shot of an episode of Hot Ones playing on YouTube. The shot shows 7 hot sauce bottles, the clearest one being a sauce called The Spicy Shark, with a cartoon of a shark breathing fire. The video is titled Sean Evans Reveals the Season 21 Hot Sauce Lineup | Hot Ones. It's on the First We Feast channel, which has 12.6 million subscribers.
